Tucson lowers his sword but only a slight.  

" Rhinox...  If they can do t=
hat to him I'm pretty sure the same has been done to the Dinobots, and poss=
ibly to Primal and Cheetor.  This situation has become increasingly severe.=
  I'm sure Rodimus is on his way to being reformatted himself.   If only we=
 had a way to copy Saberbacks intel, and transfer it back to Stanton, Bump =
and Legacy.  We could then try and trap our altered comrades and get them i=
nto stasis lock long enough to transport them out of here.  Big Convoy, how=
 many sets of stasis cuffs do you and the others have on hand?  If we play =
our cards right, we might just be able to achieve more than one goal."

Per=
petually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Oct 26, 2011, at 12:28 PM, S=
uper Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> > <OLD>
> >
> > Tucson qu=
ickly does the same as Night Viper, and prepares to take on the
> > guards =
if need be, holding his blade in a defensive position. He listens,
> > with=
 eyes shut.
> >
> > " Six figures approaching. By the sound of their footst=
eps and their
> > thermal output, they're a group of Sharkticon guards. The=
y're heading our
> > way. Quickly, find any corner you can find that isn't =
exposed to light, and
> > remain silent, with signatures scrambled. They us=
e signature tracking to
> > hunt down their prey."
> >
> > He takes a nimbl=
e but defensive pose, ready to defend his comrades if need
> > be
> 
> <NEW=
>
> 
> The SHARKTICON-like guards march down the hall until they get about
=
> halfway and then stop at a rather large door, three standing on one
> sid=
e of it and three standing on the other side of it.
> 
> The door slides op=
en and SABERBACK stepped out and looked at the
> SHARKTICONS. "Good, you ha=
ve arrived." His face was filled with
> impatience. "Here is, take him."
> =

> Another figure came walking out of the room, a large figure, large and
>=
 broad, it was RHINOX!! He came walking out as if he were in some sort
> of=
 trance.
> 
> "Take him to his cell." SABERBACK said. "He is almost finishe=
d his
> treament. It has taken me some time to rebuild him, but he is nearl=
y
> complete." The guards nodded as they began to prod RHINOX with thier
> =
butt of thier rifles, forcing him to come back in the direction they
> just=
 came from, which was away from BIG CONVOY, his team and TUSCON.
> 
> Witho=
ut a further word SABERBACK went back into the chamber, his door
> sliding =
shut behind him.
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
>

.  I'm sure Rodimus is on his way to being reformatted himself.  =
 If only we had a way to copy Saberbacks intel, and transfer it back to Sta=
nton, Bump and Legacy.  We could then try and trap our altered comrade=
s and get them into stasis lock long enough to transport them out of here. =
 Big Convoy, how many sets of stasis cuffs do you and the others have =

They're heading our<br>

<NEW><br>

The SHARKTICON-like=
 guards march down the hall until they get about<br>
halfway and then stop =
at a rather large door, three standing on one<br>
side of it and three stan=
ding on the other side of it.<br>
<br>
The door slides open and SABERBACK s=
tepped out and looked at the<br>
SHARKTICONS. "Good, you have arrived." His=
 face was filled with<br>
impatience. "Here is, take him."<br>
<br>
Another=
 figure came walking out of the room, a large figure, large and<br>
broad, =
it was RHINOX!! He came walking out as if he were in some sort<br>
of tranc=
e.<br>
<br>
"Take him to his cell." SABERBACK said. "He is almost finished =
his<br>
treament. It has taken me some time to rebuild him, but he is nearl=
y<br>
complete." The guards nodded as they began to prod RHINOX with thier<=
br>
butt of thier rifles, forcing him to come back in the direction they<br=
>
just came from, which was away from BIG CONVOY, his team and TUSCON.<br>
=
<br>
Without a further word SABERBACK went back into the chamber, his door<=
br>
sliding shut behind him.<br>
